main.name: Roger Mayer
main.description: I am a creative, problem solving developer with an aspiration to be a lifelong learner of new technologies. Through determination and consistency, I have excelled and rapidly received promotions at every job I have ever had. Now, I push myself daily in the passion of full stack web development. I am dedicated to building and optimizing the performance of user-centric, high-impact websites with clean, sustainable code.

resume.skillmessage: I love creating front end design and implementing back-end databases to customize the user experience

testimonials.text: Roger is a nurturing and fearless leader who not only progressed to the top ranks at Merit Coffee, but also was able to do so while weighing the options of going back to school for software development. During our tenure at Merit Coffee the company was going through a lot of change, mostly due to demand increase and the businesses want for grow. Roger was willing and able to adapt as direction changed on a dime, which is why I think he did so well learning at Codeup. His drive, willingness to learn, and his constant flexibility is why I'm confident he is capable of handling any project or task thrown at him.
testimonials.user: Logan Jung- Decision Science Analyst at USAA
